Title: Enhances supports and services for students with disabilities for postsecondary success
Summary: Enhances supports and services for students with disabilities for postsecondary success starting in the 2021-2022 academic year; funds shall be appropriated proportionally for each student with a disability enrolled in an institution of higher education.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enhancing supports and services for students with disabilities for postsecondary success
